BoolAdd record is used to store a boolean and a string.
C2SGenericMessage
 
Card
This abstract class represents a generic card of the game.
CardsCollection
This class is used to create a collection of cards.
Cell
This class is thought to be complementary to the class Corner.
Chat
This class represents a chat between two or more users.
ClientConnection
Class representing the connection with a client.
ClientInterface
Interface representing operations that a client can perform on the server.
Color
This enum represents the colors of the cards
CommonBoard
This class represents the common board of the game.
CommonBoardNode
Class to represent a node of the common board
ConcreteDeck
ConcreteDeck class is a class that represents a concrete deck of cards.
ConnectionSuccessfulException
This exception is thrown when the user selects an invalid choice.
Constants
Constants class contains all the constants used in the game
Coordinate
This enum represents the coordinates of the board
Corner
This class is thought to be complementary to the class Cell.
DeckFactory
Class the implements the Factory design pattern to create the different types of decks, given the different paths of the JSON files of the different types of cards.
DiagonalPatternObjectiveCard
The following class describe those objective cards that deal with ** diagonal ** pattern recognition of cards with respect to the board configuration: There are 2 possible (geometric) patterns of three cards each.
DiagonalPatternScoreStrategy
This class implements the ScoreStrategy interface and is used to calculate the score of a player
EmptyStackException
Exception thrown when trying to pop from an empty stack.
EndGameController
Controller class for the end game scene
FactQueue
This class is a queue of facts that are used to update the view
FactType
This enum represents the type of fact that can be sent to the view
FXApplication
FXApplication is the main class for the GUI side of the application.
GameController
 
GameControllerInterface
GameControllerInterface provides the methods required for controlling the game via RMI.
GameDynamic
The GameDynamic class represents the dynamic part of the game, handling game events and state changes.
GameEndedException
This exception is used to indicate that the game is not ready to run.
GameException
This is the superclass of all the exceptions that can be thrown during the game.
GameListenersSocket
This class is used to handle the messages (Listener) that are sent to the client
GameNotStartedException
This exception is thrown when the game is not started
GameStatus
This enum represents the game status
GCMsg
This abstract class represents a generic message that can be sent by the client to the server.
GCMsgChooseCard
This class represents the message sent by the client to the server to choose a card from the hand.
GCMsgDrawCard
Class to send the draw card message to the server.
GCMsgPlaceCard
Class to send the place card message to the server.
GCMsgPlaceStarterCard
Class to send the placeStarterCard message to the server.
GCMsgSendMessage
Class to send a message in the CHAT.
GCMsgSetReady
Class that represents the message sent by the client to the game controller to notify that the player is ready to start the game.
GCMsgShowOthersPersonalBoard
 
GoldCard
Represents a GoldCard, which is a subclass of Resource.
GUI
GUI class is the class that manages the GUI of the application.
GuiInputReaderController
 
IdColor
This class represents a pair of an integer id and a color.
IllegalMoveException
This class represents an exception that is thrown when an illegal move is attempted.
IndexOutOfBoundsException
This class represents an exception that is thrown when an index is out of bounds.
InvalidChoiceException
This exception is used to indicate that the game is not ready to run.
InverseMapper
 
Item
This enum represents the items of the cards
ItemObjectiveCard
The following is a subclass of ObjectiveCard and describes the Item Objective Cards.
LetterPatternObjectiveCard
The following class describe those objective cards that deal with ** letter ** pattern recognition of cards with respect to the board configuration: There are 4 possible (geometric) patterns of three cards each.
LetterPatternScoreStrategy
This class implements the ScoreStrategy interface and is used to calculate the score of a player
Listener
Remote interface for listeners observing game events.
MainClient
MainClient is the main class for the client side of the application.
MainController
The MainController class manages game instances and player interactions.
MainControllerInterface
MainControllerInterface provides the methods required for game control via RMI.
MainServer
MainServer is the main class for the server side of the application.
Mapper
 
MaxPlayersLimitException
This exception is used to indicate that the game is not ready to run.
MCMsg
 
MCMsgGameCreation
This class represents the message sent by the client to the main controller to create a new game.
MCMsgJoinFirstAvailableGame
This class represents the message sent by the client to the main controller to join the first available game
MCMsgJoinGame
 
MCMsgLeaveGame
This class represents the message sent by the client to the main controller to leave a game.
Message
This class represents a message in a chat.
MessageData
This record represents the data of a generic message that can be sent by the client to the server.
Model
This class represents the model of the game.
ModelView
Represents a serialized view of the game model that contains essential information for clients.

Abstract class for the Objective Cards.
ObserverManager
Manages the registration, removal, and notification of listeners observing game events.
Orientation
This enum represents the orientation of the cards
PersonalBoard
This class represents the personal board of a player.
Ping
Ping record is used to store a ping and a nickname.
PingSender
Sends a ping to the server to keep the connection alive.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
PlayerAlreadyConnectedException
This exception is used to indicate that a player is already connected to the game.
QueueParser
QueueParser is a thread that continuously processes input commands from a queue.
Resource
This enum represents the resources of the cards
ResourceCard
This class represents the ResourceCard.

The following is a subclass of ObjectiveCard and describes the Resource Objective Cards.

RMI client class that implements the ClientInterface.
RMIServer
RMI server class that implements the MainControllerInterface.
RunningController
RunningController is the controller class for the running phase of the game.
S2CGenericMessage
Abstract class for the messages sent from the server to the client to notify actions.
ScoreStrategy
This interface is used to calculate the score of a player: strategy pattern
SocketClient
Client socket is together with clientConnection the main class for the client side of the socket connection.
SocketServer
SocketServer class that represents the server socket
StarterCard
This class represents the starter card of the game.
StartGameController
Class that manages all the actions that happen before the main running scene
StaticPrinter
This class is used to print messages asynchronously.
StaticPrinterTUI
Utility class for printing messages to the console with optional ANSI formatting.
StaticPromptValidator
This class is used to validate the input from the user.
TUI
Text User Interface class
TuiCardGraphics
This class is used to print the graphics of the cards in the terminal.
TuiCommonBoardGraphics
Class that handles the graphics of the common board in the text user interface.
TuiPersonalBoardGraphics
This class is used to print the Personal Board of a player in the console.
TypeConnection
Enumerates the types of connection.
UI
Abstract class defining the interface for the User Interface (ui) of the application.
